tool_description: Validates course codes against the official course catalog and retrieves detailed course information including credits, prerequisites, and availability.

course_codes.description: Array of course codes to validate (e.g., ['CS101', 'MATH201'])

catalog_year.description: Academic catalog year in format YYYY-YYYY (e.g., '2023-2024')

term.description: Specific term for availability check (Fall, Spring, Summer)

error_messages: Invalid course code format: Course codes must follow standard format (e.g., CS101, MATH201).
Course not found: One or more course codes do not exist in the specified catalog year.
Invalid catalog year: Catalog year must be in YYYY-YYYY format and represent a valid academic year.
Invalid term: Term must be one of [Fall, Spring, Summer] or left unspecified.
usage: Provide an array of course codes and catalog year to validate courses. Optionally specify a term to check course availability for that specific term.

valid_courses.description: Array of course codes that were successfully validated

invalid_courses.description: Array of course codes that failed validation

course_details.description: Array of detailed course information for valid courses
